description: The gas giant TOI-2109b, over five times Jupiter’s mass, is spiraling closer to its star in a rare planetary death spiral. With a 16-hour orbit and blistering heat, the exoplanet could either plunge into its host star, be torn apart by tidal forces, or evolve into a rocky super-Earth through photoevaporation. NASA’s TESS and ESA’s Cheops data confirm its orbit is decaying by 10 seconds every 3 years. TOI-2109b’s extreme case offers astronomers a powerful chance to study how gas giants die—or transform—revealing secrets of planetary evolution across the galaxy.
title: Doomed Exoplanet TOI-2109b Spirals Toward Its Star with Three Possible Fates

description: Hari Hara Veera Mallu is a Pawan Kalayan starrer that revolves around an Indian named Veera, who is sent to retrieve the Koh-i-noor diamond from Aurangzeb. As he fights the Mughal Emperor, there will be action, intense sequences, and a lot more. Remember, this is more than a mission for Veera.
title: Hari Hara Veera Mallu OTT Release Reportedly Revealed: Everything You Need to Know

description: Hubble has captured images of comet 3I/ATLAS, an ancient interstellar object likely 7 billion years old. As only the third known visitor from beyond the solar system, it offers rare insights into distant planetary systems. With its water ice and D-type asteroid-like dust, 3I/ATLAS is now under global scientific scrutiny before it vanishes back into deep space.
title: Hubble Captures First Images of Ancient Interstellar Visitor Comet 3I/ATLAS

description: UBTECH’s Walker S2 is a humanoid robot that can replace its own battery, reducing human intervention. Ideal for automation in industries and customer service, this 2025 innovation sets a new benchmark in robotics with its smart energy management and autonomous charging capabilities.
title: Meet Walker S2: The Self-Sufficient Humanoid Robot with Swappable Battery Tech

description: Parijatha Parvam is a Telugu crime comedy that follows a fake kidnapping gone hilariously wrong. With multiple parties after the same target, chaos and confusion unfold. Featuring Chaitanya Rao, Shraddha Das, and Sunil, the film is packed with unexpected twists. Now streaming on LionsgatePlay, it's a fun watch for fans of offbeat thrillers and comedy.
title: Parijatha Parvam Streaming Now on LionsgatePlay: A Twisted Telugu Crime Comedy Full of Chaos and Laughter

description: Saare Jahan Se Acha, a Netflix series, is set to release in August. This is a story of a patriotic spy, set on a mission to stop a nuclear program across the border. He is stuck in a situation where time is limited and he must protect his country at all costs. So what does he do? Risk it all for the government, stay tuned to watch it on Netflix on 13th August 2025.
title: Saare Jahan Se Acha OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Pratik Gandhi Starrer Movie

description: The Plot is a Korean Crime Thriller movie which has been written and directed by Lee Yo-Sup. The movie follows a contract killer named Brian, who escapes an assassination, from his own planned accident. As he begins to investigate, things get intense. Will he find the one? Streaming now.
title: The Plot Now Streaming on Lionsgate Play: What You Need to Know About Korean Crime Thriller Movie

description: X&Y is a comedy-drama. It is a fantasy comedy drama. When an unborn soul is desperate to go on Earth once and is given s mission to find his parents, and upon their union, he can live. Once he gets life, the harsh realities, unexpected struggle and the emotional turmoil, make him weary, and he prays to go back and never wants to be born ever again. The movie is now streaming on Sun NXT.
title: X&Y Now Streaming on SunNXT: What You Need to Know About This Comedy Kannada Drama Movie

description: The iPhone 16e is now available at a discounted rate via multiple online platforms. On Vijay Sales, the 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB models are priced at Rs. 52,990, Rs. 61,990, and Rs. 78,990, respectively. They are down from their launch prices of Rs. 59,900,  69,900 and Rs. 89,900, respectively. Amazon and Flipkart are also selling the iPhone 16e at a discounted price. Customers can also get up to Rs. 4,000 off with select bank cards and additional savings through exchange offers.
title: iPhone 16e Price in India Discounted on Vijay Sales, Amazon and Others: Check Offer

description: iQOO has revealed the design of the iQOO Z10 Turbo+. It appears to have a dual rear camera unit and a flat display with a hole-punch cutout for the selfie camera. It is teased to feature a 7K Ice Dome VC liquid cooling system for thermal management. It is already confirmed to ship with MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset and an 8,000mAh battery.
title: iQOO Z10 Turbo+ Design Teased Ahead of Launch; Pre-Reservations Begin

description: The release date for Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection has leaked. The game's listing on the Xbox app reportedly showed the release date as September 29. The collection will feature multiple versions of the first four Mortal Kombat games.
title: Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection's Leaked Release Date Points to September Launch

description: The Chinese smartphone manufacturer unveiled its foldable handset, OnePlus Open, in October 2023 in India. The phone is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 SoC, paired with 16 GB of RAM and up to 1GB of onboard storage. The company has now launched the OxygenOS 15 OTA update for the smartphone in India that brings a slew of features to it.
title: OnePlus Open Gets New OxygenOS 15 Update in India With New Features and Latest Security Patch

description: Perplexity for macOS now offers users access to Anthropic’s Model Context Protocol (MCP) to let the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot connect to the device. Last week, the San Francisco, California-based AI firm announced that its Mac app now offers local MCP support (connectivity across the device) to paid subscribers.
title: Perplexity’s macOS App Gets Support for Anthropic’s MCP for System Tasks: Here's How to Use It

description: Primebook is gearing up to launch the Primebook 2 Neo laptop in India later this week. The new laptop will be powered by a MediaTek Helio G99 chip with 6GB RAM and run on the company’s own OS. It will support up to 512GB of expandable storage and feature an inbuilt on-screen AI assistant.
title: Primebook 2 Neo With MediaTek Helio G99 SoC to Launch in India on July 31; Price, Specifications Teased

description: Tencent’s Hunyuan team released a new artificial intelligence (AI) model on Sunday, which can generate three-dimensional (3D) worlds. Dubbed Hunyuan 3D World Model 1.0, it is an open-source model that supports both text and images as input. The model can generate 360-degree world views which are both explorable and interactive.
title: Tencent’s Hunyuan Team Releases Open-Source Hunyuan3D World Model 1.0, Can Generate Explorable 3D Worlds

description: A recent report suggests that Vivo is gearing up to launch the Y31 5G in India soon as a budget smartphone. While the company hasn’t revealed its features yet, details about the phone’s specifications, launch date, and availability are expected to surface shortly. The older Vivo Y31 4G variant was priced at Rs. 16,490 and featured a Snapdragon 662 SoC, 48-megapixel triple rear cameras, and a 5,000mAh battery. In comparison, the Vivo Y30 5G came with a MediaTek Dimensity 700 chip, 50-megapixel dual cameras, and gaming enhancement features.
title: Vivo Y31 5G Budget Smartphone Tipped to Launch in India Soon

description: Acerpure Advance G Series TVs were launched in India on Monday. Available in 65-inch and 75-inch screen sizes, the lineup is powered by the Google TV platform. The TVs sport QLED screens with 120Hz refresh rate and MEMC technology. Voice control is offered via Google assistant. For audio, the Acerpure Advance G Series has integrated 55W subwoofers and Dolby Atmos support.
title: Acerpure Advance G Series TVs Launched in India With 120Hz QLED Screen and Dolby Atmos Audio

description: Meizu 21 was launched in November 2023 with 1.74mm bezels. Now, the Chinese company is working on outdoing itself by launching a phone that has even thinner bezels. In a social media post, the company has teased its upcoming Meizu 22 handset, which is claimed to have the world’s narrowest bezels ever put on a phone. Last year, the company announced that it was moving out of the smartphone market and venturing into AI. Hence, Meizu 22 could be its last smartphone.
title: Meizu 22 Design Teased: to Offer Narrowest Bezels Ever On a Smartphone

description: It may not seem like a lot, but Oppo and Hasselblad put in a lot of collaborative effort to deliver the Chinese smartphonemaker’s latest flagship, the Find X8 Ultra. Since the phone was already announced a few months ago, Oppo’s focus with its renewed Hasselblad partnership lies in future technologies. But we were more interested in Oppo’s current take on photography accessory kits, AI in smartphone photography and more.
title: Oppo on its Hasselblad Partnership, Photography Kits and AI-Less Smartphone Photography

description: Runway released a new artificial intelligence (AI) video generation model on Friday that can edit elements in other input videos. Dubbed Aleph (the first letter of the Hebrew alphabet), the video-to-video AI model can perform a wide range of edits on the input, including adding, removing, and transforming objects; adding new angles and next frames; changing the environment, seasons, and the time of the day; and transforming the style.
title: Runway Unveils Aleph Video-to-Video AI Model That Can Be Used for Post-Production

description: Samsung on Monday announced the third edition of the ‘Walk-a-thon India' challenge, following up on the second edition that took place in April. As part of the initiative, users of Samsung Galaxy devices are required to walk a certain number of steps in a limited duration. They will compete with others for a chance to win the new Galaxy Watch 8. All participants completing the challenge will receive assured discount coupons on the smartwatch as well.
title: Samsung Announces Third Edition of ‘Walk-a-thon India’ Challenge; Galaxy Watch 8 to Be Won

description: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered has reached over nine million players, Bethesda confirmed Friday. The remaster is available on PC, PS5, Xbox Series S/X and Game Pass.
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Has Crossed 9 Million Players

description: The Vivo T4R 5G is set to launch in India on July 31 and will be priced under Rs. 20,000. It will feature a quad-curved AMOLED display with HDR10+ support, a 120Hz refresh rate, and an SGS low blue light certification. Powered by a 4nm MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, it will include a 50-megapixel Sony IMX882 main camera and a 32-megapixel selfie shooter, both supporting 4K video recording.
title: Vivo T4R 5G Price Range in India and Key Features Revealed Ahead of July 31 Launch

description: Vivo Y400 will be launched in Indonesia on August 4. Vivo has listed the handset on its official website, showing design and specifications. It will come in two colourways with a 6.67-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display. It has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit and IP68+IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance.
title: Vivo Y400 Launch Date Teased; to Feature 6,000mAh Battery, Dual Rear Cameras

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) is now allowing its subscribers in two new circles to get its recently rolled out Non-Stop Hero recharge plans. Although there are 14 plans in total that the telecom giant offers as part of the Non-Stop Hero range, in the two new circles, there are only three recharge plans available.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) Non-Stop Hero Recharge Plans Now Available in Mumbai, Maharashtra & Goa Circles: Benefits

description: The month-long Walk-a-thon India, Aug’25 challenge, taking place from August 1 to August 31, 2025, is open to anyone with the Samsung Health app on their smartphone.
title: Step Into Wellness With Samsung: Join Walk-a-Thon India Challenge

description: Microsoft is reportedly developing a new feature for Copilot, which could be powered by OpenAI’s upcoming GPT-5 model. As per the report, Copilot is getting a new “Smart” mode, which can automatically deduce when to apply reasoning for a query and when to switch to fast responses. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has also mentioned that the GPT-5 artificial intelligence (AI) model will mark the unification of the GPT-series and the reasoning-focused o-series models.
title: Microsoft Reportedly Working on a Smart Mode for Copilot, Could Be Unveiled Alongside OpenAI’s GPT-5

description: Redmi Note 14 SE 5G was launched in India at Rs. 14,999 for the 6GB + 128GB variant. It features a MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra chip, a 5,110mAh battery, and a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-600 triple rear camera setup. The AMOLED display supports up to 2,100 nits of brightness and is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 5. It will go on sale starting August 7 via Flipkart, Xiaomi's online and offline stores, and authorised partners, with a Rs. 1,000 discount on select bank cards.
title: Redmi Note 14 SE 5G Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra SoC, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera

description: The durability of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 has been put to the test by a YouTube content creator, and the foldable phone appears to have performed well. The phone measures 4.2mm in thickness when unfolded and 8.9mm when folded, which is significantly thinner than its predecessors. Samsung Display recently revealed that the phone’s inner display can survive over 5 lakh folds, or 10 years for an average user, folding and unfolding the phone 100 times a day.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Survives Bend Test Despite Its Thinner Design

description: Tesla has signed a strategic pact with Samsung Electronics for the fabrication of next generation chips, CEO Elon Musk announced on Monday. The deal is said to be worth $16.5 billion (roughly Rs. 1.4 lakh crore) and will see the South Korean tech conglomerate’s foundry division manufacture AI6 chips at its Texas plant, which are expected to bthen be used in Tesla EVs for powering full self-driving (FSD), other autonomous systems, and sensor suites.
title: Tesla Signs $16.5 Billion Deal With Samsung for Fabrication of AI6 Chips at Texas Plant

description: Vivo V60 will launch soon in India, though an exact date and availability are yet to be announced. A leak suggests the launch could be on August 12, with an expected price between Rs. 37,000 and Rs. 40,000. It has appeared on certification sites like TRDA, SIRIM, Geekbench, and TUV. The Vivo V60 is expected to feature a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chip, a Zeiss-backed 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit, and a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Vivo V60 India Launch Teased; Reportedly Spotted on TRDA Certification Site

description: Xiaomi 15 Ultra was introduced in the Chinese market in February. Now, rumours about the Xiaomi 16 Ultra's launch timeline are appearing on the Web. Initial leaks suggest an early launch timeline for the flagship smartphone. The brand has officially confirmed the existence of the Xiaomu 15 Ultra's successor well in advance.
title: Xiaomi 16 Ultra Officially Teased; Said to Launch By the End of This Year

description: AI Mode in Search first received a shortcut in the Google app for Android in April for those who registered for the Search Labs experiment. Now, as per a report, this shortcut is rolling out widely to more users globally. This shortcut icon appears primarily in two places: in the Google app’s widget as the third icon, and in the app’s search box.
title: AI Mode in Search Shortcut in Google’s Android App Reportedly Rolling Out Widely

description: Elden Ring Nightreign, the multiplayer action-survival title, is getting a two-player Duos Expeditions mode this week as part of a new update. Patch 1.02, which also features other quality-of-life improvements, will be released on July 30.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign is Getting a Two-Player Duos Expeditions Mode This Week

description: Apple could bring camera upgrades to the iPhone 17 Pro models. They could pack a new telephoto lens with support for up to 8x optical zoom. They are said to feature a new Pro Camera app and a new Camera Control button.
title: iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max Tipped to Offer 8x Optical Zoom, New Pro Camera App, More

description: Noise has launched the Air Clips 2 OWS earphones in India, priced at Rs. 3,999. They offer up to 40 hours of battery life with the case and feature 12mm drivers powered by Airwave Technology. The earphones come with a clip-on design and are available in Frost Black, Frost Green, and Frost Ivory colourways. A pre-order pass priced at Rs. 499 offers coupons worth Rs. 1,749. They go on sale starting at noon on July 29 via Amazon and the Noise India website.
title: Noise Air Clips 2 OWS Earphones Launched in India With Up to 40 Hours Total Battery Life

description: Oppo has officially teased the upcoming K13 Turbo series for India, confirming its launch soon. While the teaser only names the K13 Turbo lineup, it’s likely to include both the standard K13 Turbo and the K13 Turbo Pro. The phones are already available in China.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo Series Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; to Be Available on Flipkart

description: Samsung released its Android 16-based One UI 8 firmware with the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 earlier this month. Among the myriad of new additions, the South Korean tech giant is said to have quietly removed a few features too. According to a report, the OEM Unlocking setting is nowhere to be found in the One UI 8 stable build. This option enables Samsung users to flash and run custom ROMs on their Galaxy devices.
title: Samsung One UI 8 Update Removes OEM Unlocking Option for Flashing Custom ROMs: Report

description: WhatsApp is said to be testing a new feature for its Android app which makes it easier to import profile photos from other existing social media accounts. According to a discovery by a feature tracker, the instant messaging client may bring support for directly importing profile pictures from other apps under Meta Platforms’ umbrella, such as Facebook and Instagram. This builds upon other cross-platform features such as single sign-on and unified avatar management.
title: WhatsApp Said to Be Testing Feature That Lets You Import Profile Photos from Facebook or Instagram

description: OnePlus Buds 4 is a great TWS option for those on a budget. It offers a solid ANC performance, and the sound quality is primarily balanced. There are enough personalisation options for consumers on the companion app. The design is lightweight, and the TWS offers thumping bass for those who love it. The design is a mixed bag and might or might not be liked by everyone.
title: OnePlus Buds 4 Review: The New Standard for Value ANC Earbuds
